pullRequest.title: Fully implement `NotificationWillShowInForeground`
pullRequest.bodyText:
Prep for NotificationWillShowInForeground

NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler will be responsible for setting the notifications display type if a dev decides so

Alternative is a global setter that also controls the default for OSNotificationDisplay if no NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler is set
Renamed None to SILENT and Notification to NOTIFICATION to follow a caps snake-case enum convention


Removed InAppAlert from InFocusDisplayOption

Refactored InFocusDisplayOption to OSNotificationDisplay
Cleaned out InAppAlert related UnitTests



After Merge: feature/implement_notification_foreground_handler_with_extension_and_bubbling

1 can be implemented through the notification extension service and be known as the ExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler

This involves a new metadata tag in apps using OneSignal,
On init of OneSignal, searches for an extension service file and save the implementations as global handlers to be used throughout OneSignal codebase


Second one will be implemented through a public OneSignal setter called setNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler and is known as the AppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler

From these handlers a set of new functionality exists now:

This includes bubbling from ext to app handler to mimic iOS handler before showing notification
Also without bubbling a 30 second timeout will begin counting down before showing notification by default




Renamed NotificationGenerationJob to OSNotificationGenerationJob
To help keep things private within the handlers, a NotificationGenerationJob class was made to be extended by a ExtNotificationGenerationJob and AppNotificationGenerationJob
Removed what is believed to be final Alert based flow for showing a notification

After Merge: feature/implement_notification_foreground_handler_unit_tests

Implemented all test scenarios shown within this ticket

https://onesignal.atlassian.net/browse/OS-4175



After Merge: feature/add_worker_class_for_processing_and_foreground_handler

Implemented a Worker to go from:

NotificationProcessingHandler
ExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
AppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
Showing the Notification


Fixed all UnitTests relying on startExtenderService and now should be using NotificationProcessingHandler implementation instead

More merges coming soon...
Next Steps

Unit Tests need to be added for new NotificationWillShowInForeground functionality

https://onesignal.atlassian.net/browse/OS-4175
#1030


Work managers should be implemented to process these one at a time as they come in

https://onesignal.atlassian.net/browse/OS-3794
#1034
NotificationRestoring... Handler? #1044
NotificationProcessingHandler & NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler #1091
NotificationOpenedHandler
InAppMessageClickedHandler





This change is

nodes.bodyText: If we are removing the getInAppAlertNotificationEnabled flag we should remove the isActive check as well

Redundant APIs create another surface which has a lot of dependencies:

More SDK code and code paths
Unit Tests
Manual testing
Documentation & Examples

Not saying we would never want a redundant API, just it should have a good use case. In this case if they wanted to not show a notification when the app is in focus for some reason I can't see way they won't want to setup a notifiationWillShowInForegorund handler.

beforeCommit.message:
Implementing new NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers (#1014)

* Refactor prep for `InFocusDisplayOption` in `NotifForegroundHandler`
* `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` will be responsible for setting the notifications display type if a dev decides so
  * Alternative is a global setter that also controls the default for `OSNotificationDisplay` if no `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` is set
  * Renamed `None` to `SILENT` and `Notification` to `NOTIFICATION` to follow a caps snake-case enum convention
* Removed `InAppAlert` from `InFocusDisplayOption`
  * Refactored `InFocusDisplayOption` to `OSNotificationDisplay`
  * Cleaned out `InAppAlert` related `UnitTests`

* Implementing new NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers
  * 1 can be implemented through the notification extension service and be known as the `ExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
    * This involves a new metadata tag in apps using OneSignal,
    * On init of OneSignal, searches for an extension service file and save the implementations as global handlers to be used throughout OneSignal codebase
  * Second one will be implemented through a public OneSignal setter called `setNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` and is known as the `AppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
    * From these handlers a set of new functionality exists now:
      * This includes bubbling from ext to app handler to mimic iOS handler before showing notification
      * Also without bubbling a 30 second timeout will begin counting down before showing notification by default
  * Renamed `NotificationGenerationJob` to `OSNotificationGenerationJob`
  * To help keep things private within the handlers, a `NotificationGenerationJob` class was made to be extended by a `ExtNotificationGenerationJob` and `AppNotificationGenerationJob`
* Removed what is believed to be final Alert based flow for showing a notification

* Unit Tests need to be fixed and new ones added still after validating functionality here
* Next the Work manager should be implemented to process these one at a time as they come in

* Fixing review comments
* Refactored `bubble(boolean bubble)` method to `complete(boolean bubble)`
* Added additional data getter for `OSNotificationGenerationJob`
* Added constant keys for params in notification payload
* Removed `OneSignal.setNotificationDisplayOption` and other related fields

* Cleaned up previous commit(s) for this PR
* UnitTests failing, needed to rework notification display flow a little
* Removed more Alert based notification code `showNotificationAsAlert`
* Refactored `ProcessJobForDisplay` to perfection in terms of mimic'ing current master implementation but removing Alert based handling and including new `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
* Replaced method `NotificationExtenderService.showNotification` with `GenerateNotification.fromJsonPayload`
* Removed `OSNotificationGenerationJob` from PackagePrivate helper file because it is public already

Done with fixing unit tests and getting functionality matching previous NotificationReceivedHandler SDK functionality
* WIP - Need to write new unit tests to test new functionality, this will go in a new PR branched off this PR branch

* Removed Thread for `ProcessJobForDisplay` to fix UnitTests

afterCommit.message: Alert was removed, so isActive check no longer needed here

beforeCommit.message:
Merging branch after accidentally force pushing without pulling first
* `implement_notification_foreground_handler_with_extension_and_bubbling`

* `getDBHelperInstance` isn't really necessary as we can easily get a DB instance with `OneSignalDbHelper.getInstance(OneSignal.appContext);`
* `AppEntryAction` needs to be public, but we might want to move this outside of `OneSignal` class

commit.message:
Refactor prep for `InFocusDisplayOption` in `NotifForegroundHandler`
* `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` will be responsible for setting the notifications display type if a dev decides so
  * Alternative is a global setter that also controls the default for `OSNotificationDisplay` if no `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` is set
  * Renamed `None` to `SILENT` and `Notification` to `NOTIFICATION` to follow a caps snake-case enum convention
* Removed `InAppAlert` from `InFocusDisplayOption`
  * Refactored `InFocusDisplayOption` to `OSNotificationDisplay`
  * Cleaned out `InAppAlert` related `UnitTests`
Refactored `mPromptLocation` to `mAutoPromptLocation`
Alert was removed, so isActive check no longer needed here

Refactor prep for `InFocusDisplayOption` in `NotifForegroundHandler`
* `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` will be responsible for setting the notifications display type if a dev decides so
  * Alternative is a global setter that also controls the default for `OSNotificationDisplay` if no `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` is set
  * Renamed `None` to `SILENT` and `Notification` to `NOTIFICATION` to follow a caps snake-case enum convention
* Removed `InAppAlert` from `InFocusDisplayOption`
  * Refactored `InFocusDisplayOption` to `OSNotificationDisplay`
  * Cleaned out `InAppAlert` related `UnitTests`

Refactor prep for `InFocusDisplayOption` in `NotifForegroundHandler`
* `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` will be responsible for setting the notifications display type if a dev decides so
  * Alternative is a global setter that also controls the default for `OSNotificationDisplay` if no `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` is set
  * Renamed `None` to `SILENT` and `Notification` to `NOTIFICATION` to follow a caps snake-case enum convention
* Removed `InAppAlert` from `InFocusDisplayOption`
  * Refactored `InFocusDisplayOption` to `OSNotificationDisplay`
  * Cleaned out `InAppAlert` related `UnitTests`

Implementing new NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers
  * 1 can be implemented through the notification extension service and be known as the `ExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
    * This involves a new metadata tag in apps using OneSignal,
    * On init of OneSignal, searches for an extension service file and save the implementations as global handlers to be used throughout OneSignal codebase
  * Second one will be implemented through a public OneSignal setter called `setNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` and is known as the `AppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
    * From these handlers a set of new functionality exists now:
      * This includes bubbling from ext to app handler to mimic iOS handler before showing notification
      * Also without bubbling a 30 second timeout will begin counting down before showing notification by default
  * Renamed `NotificationGenerationJob` to `OSNotificationGenerationJob`
  * To help keep things private within the handlers, a `NotificationGenerationJob` class was made to be extended by a `ExtNotificationGenerationJob` and `AppNotificationGenerationJob`
* Removed what is believed to be final Alert based flow for showing a notification

* Unit Tests need to be fixed and new ones added still after validating functionality here
* Next the Work manager should be implemented to process these one at a time as they come in

Fixing review comments
* Refactored `bubble(boolean bubble)` method to `complete(boolean bubble)`
* Added additional data getter for `OSNotificationGenerationJob`
* Added constant keys for params in notification payload
* Removed `OneSignal.setNotificationDisplayOption` and other related fields

Cleaned up previous commit(s) for this PR
* UnitTests failing, needed to rework notification display flow a little
* Removed more Alert based notification code `showNotificationAsAlert`
* Refactored `ProcessJobForDisplay` to perfection in terms of mimic'ing current master implementation but removing Alert based handling and including new `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
* Replaced method `NotificationExtenderService.showNotification` with `GenerateNotification.fromJsonPayload`
* Removed `OSNotificationGenerationJob` from PackagePrivate helper file because it is public already

Done with fixing unit tests and getting functionality matching previous NotificationReceivedHandler SDK functionality
* WIP - Need to write new unit tests to test new functionality, this will go in a new PR branched off this PR branch
Removed Thread for `ProcessJobForDisplay` to fix UnitTests

Mistakes when rebasing, but easy fixes
* Unnecessary unit test static variables removed
* `getDBHelperInstance` isn't really necessary as we can easily get a DB instance with `OneSignalDbHelper.getInstance(OneSignal.appContext);`
* `AppEntryAction` needs to be public, but we might want to move this outside of `OneSignal` class

Refactor prep for `InFocusDisplayOption` in `NotifForegroundHandler`
* `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` will be responsible for setting the notifications display type if a dev decides so
  * Alternative is a global setter that also controls the default for `OSNotificationDisplay` if no `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` is set
  * Renamed `None` to `SILENT` and `Notification` to `NOTIFICATION` to follow a caps snake-case enum convention
* Removed `InAppAlert` from `InFocusDisplayOption`
  * Refactored `InFocusDisplayOption` to `OSNotificationDisplay`
  * Cleaned out `InAppAlert` related `UnitTests`
Alert was removed, so isActive check no longer needed here

Refactor prep for `InFocusDisplayOption` in `NotifForegroundHandler`
* `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` will be responsible for setting the notifications display type if a dev decides so
  * Alternative is a global setter that also controls the default for `OSNotificationDisplay` if no `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` is set
  * Renamed `None` to `SILENT` and `Notification` to `NOTIFICATION` to follow a caps snake-case enum convention
* Removed `InAppAlert` from `InFocusDisplayOption`
  * Refactored `InFocusDisplayOption` to `OSNotificationDisplay`
  * Cleaned out `InAppAlert` related `UnitTests`

Implementing new NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers
  * 1 can be implemented through the notification extension service and be known as the `ExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
    * This involves a new metadata tag in apps using OneSignal,
    * On init of OneSignal, searches for an extension service file and save the implementations as global handlers to be used throughout OneSignal codebase
  * Second one will be implemented through a public OneSignal setter called `setNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` and is known as the `AppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
    * From these handlers a set of new functionality exists now:
      * This includes bubbling from ext to app handler to mimic iOS handler before showing notification
      * Also without bubbling a 30 second timeout will begin counting down before showing notification by default
  * Renamed `NotificationGenerationJob` to `OSNotificationGenerationJob`
  * To help keep things private within the handlers, a `NotificationGenerationJob` class was made to be extended by a `ExtNotificationGenerationJob` and `AppNotificationGenerationJob`
* Removed what is believed to be final Alert based flow for showing a notification

* Unit Tests need to be fixed and new ones added still after validating functionality here
* Next the Work manager should be implemented to process these one at a time as they come in

Cleaned up previous commit(s) for this PR
* UnitTests failing, needed to rework notification display flow a little
* Removed more Alert based notification code `showNotificationAsAlert`
* Refactored `ProcessJobForDisplay` to perfection in terms of mimic'ing current master implementation but removing Alert based handling and including new `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
* Replaced method `NotificationExtenderService.showNotification` with `GenerateNotification.fromJsonPayload`
* Removed `OSNotificationGenerationJob` from PackagePrivate helper file because it is public already

Done with fixing unit tests and getting functionality matching previous NotificationReceivedHandler SDK functionality
* WIP - Need to write new unit tests to test new functionality, this will go in a new PR branched off this PR branch

Slight tweaks to the flow of the NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
* Removed unnecessary nested Threads wrapping Runnables
* 3 NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler UnitTests built now and all passing correctly
  * Will use these as a template for other scenarios

UniTests in this commit:
* `testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_completeBubbles_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
* `testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_completeDoesNotBubble_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
* `testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_bubblesAfter30SecondTimeout_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`

Finished Jira unit tests for NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
* No extension service class tests
  * Testing the scenario where no foreground handlers have been setup
  * `testNullExtAndAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers`
* `NotificationExtensionService_notifJobPayload` class tests
  * Testing that the data in the accessible getters is correct for the notifJobs
  * `testNullExtAndAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers`
* `NotificationExtensionService_bubblesAfter30SecondTimeout_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` class tests
  * Testing 30 second notification timeout bubbling
  * testNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_bubbles30SecondTimeout_forExtAndAppHandlers
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_bubblesAfter30SecondTimeout_withNullAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_bubblesAfter30SecondTimeout_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
* `NotificationExtensionService_completeDoesNotBubble_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` class tests
  * Testing scenarios where no bubbling should occur
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_completeDoesNotBubble_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_completeDoesNotBubble_toNullAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
* `NotificationExtensionService_completeBubbles_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` class tests
  * Testing scenarios where bubbling is controlled with complete method
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_completeBubbles_toAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_completeBubbles_withNullAppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler
* `NotificationExtensionService_setNotificationDisplayOptionToSilent` class tests
  * Testing scenarios where `setNotificationDisplayOption` is set to `SILENT`
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_setNotificationDisplayOptionToSilent
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_setNotificationDisplayOptionToSilent_andThenToNotification
* `NotificationExtensionService_setNotificationDisplayOptionToNotification` class tests
  * Testing scenarios where `setNotificationDisplayOption` is set to `NOTIFICATION`
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_setNotificationDisplayOptionToNotification
  * testExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler_setNotificationDisplayOptionToNotification_andThenToSilent
Fixing UnitTest steps comment numbering

Minor fixes from PR comments as well as `OSTimeoutHandler` class
* `OSTimeoutHandler` class extended by a class to create Timeout for that instance of the class
  * Start timeout with `startTimeout` and stop with `destroyTimeout`
  * Extended by `NotificationGenerationJob`, which is extended by `AppNotificationGenerationJob` and `ExtNotificationGenerationJob`
* Added a `isComplete` `boolean` to the `NotificationGenerationJob` class to make sure complete methods can not be called twice
  * Use case would be that work inside of a handler takes longer than timeout, but also calls complete at the end
  * `isComplete` would be set `true` already so no way to complete more than once
* `AppNotificationGenerationJob` and `ExtNotificationGenerationJob` now have `synchronized` on complete methods

Added 1 unit test for App/Ext `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
* Test is in regards to work taking longer than 30 second timeout
  * Simulate work taking 30+ seconds and make sure complete is not called successfully twice
  * This is guarded by `synchronized` and `isComplete` `boolean` internal to `NotificationGenerationJob`
* Using a newly created `callbackCounter` which is used to increment the number of times and event occurred
  * In this case we only want the App/Ext `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` to fire once

`NotificationWillShowInForeground` won't fire when app is in background
* Added a unit test for testing this as well

Broke up `fireNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers` method
* Split up `fireNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers` into two methods
  * `boolean shouldFireForegroundHandlers` and `void fireForegroundHandlers`
* Refactored `ProcessJobForDisplay` to `processJobForDisplay`
* Removed unused imports and methods
  * `bundleAsJsonArray` and `saveAndProcessNotification`
Forgot to add `AppNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` to unit test

WIP - Working on a single Worker `NotificationWorker`
* `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
* `NotificationProcessingHandler`

WIP - Single Worker for notification processing and foreground handlers
* `Worker` class resides within the `OSNotificationWorkManager` class
  * `NotificationWorker` extends `Worker` class
  * Constructs a `OSNotificationReceived` instance inside `doWork` override and fires the `OneSignal.NotificationProcessingHandler`
* Converted `NotificationExtenderService` to `OSNotificationExtender`
  * Removed extended `JobIntentService`
  * Removed `onNotificationProcessing` and created a public `OneSignal.NotificationProcessingHandler`
  * Belongs to the `OSNotificationReceived` class now
* `OSNotificationReceived` now has 3 methods for handling the `OneSignal.NotificationProcessingHandler`
  * Extending `OSTimeoutHandler` now and this calls complete method if the `postDelayed` `runnable` is ran
  * `setModifiedContent`, `display`, and `complete`
  * Responsible for the `OSNotificationExtender` class so that `setModifiedContent`, `display`, and `complete` may be called
* Commented out some broken UnitTests for now related to `startExtenderService` method
  * Refactored now so UnitTests will need to be refactored to accommodate that change
  * Added `setupWorkManager` to `HMSDataMessageReceivedIntegrationTestsRunner` `beforeEachTest` method
  * Added `setupWorkManager` to `MainOneSignalClassRunner` `beforeEachTest` method
* WIP - Need to find a solution for the high priority notifications
  * Previously processed through a `JobIntentService` relying on `completeWakefulIntent`

Merge branch 'feature/implement_notification_foreground_handler_with_in_focus_display_option' into feature/add_worker_class_for_processing_and_foreground_handler

# Conflicts:
#	OneSignalSDK/onesignal/src/main/java/com/onesignal/NotificationBundleProcessor.java
#	OneSignalSDK/onesignal/src/main/java/com/onesignal/NotificationExtenderService.java
#	OneSignalSDK/onesignal/src/main/java/com/onesignal/OSNotificationGenerationJob.java
#	OneSignalSDK/onesignal/src/main/java/com/onesignal/OneSignal.java
#	OneSignalSDK/unittest/build.gradle
#	OneSignalSDK/unittest/src/test/java/com/test/onesignal/GenerateNotificationRunner.java
#	OneSignalSDK/unittest/src/test/java/com/test/onesignal/TestHelpers.java

Also fixed unit tests related to changes on this PR in general not associated with the update merge
* `hasExtenderService` within the `FCMBroadcastReceiver` is no longer necessary
  * No need to have the `Extender` as a `boolean` anymore

Fixed all UnitTests related to old NotificationExtenderService
  * Replaced by `NotificationProcessingHandler`, which will be an implemented `interface` in a developers custom app `NotificationExtensionService`
    * Follows same similar implementation to the `ExtNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` as well as the `NotificationOpenedHandler`
  * Added a `try-catch` around the `NotificationProcessingHandler.notificationProcessing` method call
    * If something fails we can bail and still show the notification the correct way
    * Might need to do this in the `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` as well
  * Added `OSNotificationExtender.setupNotificationExtensionServiceClass()` to `OneSignalPackagePrivateHelper`
    * For UnitTests so we don't need OneSignal init (`setAppId` and `setAppContext`) to setup a dev's extension service
  * When calling `showNotification` we will want to call `join` after so that work on thread is completely finished

Fixed UnitTest(s)
  * `shouldNotFailedNotificationExtenderServiceWhenAlertIsNull` is now `testNotificationProcessing_whenAlertIsNull`
  * `notificationExtenderServiceOverridePropertiesWithSummaryApi17` is now `testNotificationExtensionServiceOverridePropertiesWithSummaryApi17`
  * `notificationExtenderServiceOverridePropertiesWithSummary` is now `testNotificationExtensionServiceOverridePropertiesWithSummary`
  * `notificationExtenderServiceOverrideShouldOverrideAndroidNotificationId` is now `testNotificationProcessing_twoNotificationsWithSameOverrideAndroidNotificationId`
  * `shouldFireNotificationExtenderService` is now `testNotificationExtensionService_notificationProcessingProperties`

  * Commented out `shouldStartFCMServiceOnAndroidOWhenPriorityIsHighAndContainsRemoteResource`
    * No solution for high priority (> 9) notifications as of now with the `WorkManager`

Minor improvements
  * Removed unnecessary `new Thread` wrapping the `showNotification` method
  * Created helper methods for firing both `NotificationWillShowInForegroundHandlers`
    * Added `try-catch` around the `extNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler` as well as `appNotificationWillShowInForegroundHandler`
  * Added comment to the `NotificationProcessingHandler` interface
  * `TODOs` added to a few pieces of code that will be modified in future
    * `NotificationOpenedHandler` fired from `fireNotificationOpenedHandler` method

Added `osNotificationId` param as a unique work id
  * `OSNotificationWorkManager.beginEnqueueingWork` now has a `osNotificationId` param for giving the WorkRequest a unique id
    * If we try to trigger another WorkRequest while one with that OS id is already running, we simply ignore the new attempt and let the current job finish
    * Replaced `enqueue` method with `enqueueUniqueWork` and added the `ExistingWorkPolicy.KEEP`

Fixed some notification restore UnitTests
* WorkManager uses OneSignal notification id now for creating enqueueing a unique WorkRequest
  * This should work for showing a new notification and restoring a notification
  * Fixing the restoring notifications was done by adding the `NotificationTable.COLUMN_NAME_NOTIFICATION_ID` column to the array of String columns. Now when querying SQL for notifications to restore we can access the OneSignal notification id

Added runtime check before showing a notification (#1110)

* Added runtime check before showing a notification
  * Notification should never be processed for display from the Main Thread
  * This can cause an `ANR` if work is taking too long before showing the notification
  * Created a `OSThrowable` class with a `OSMainThreadException`

* Broken logic when processing a duplicate notification
  * This was change in this PR #1010
  * Added back the correct logic now and UnitTests pass

* Replaced `processJobForDisplay` call with Worker kickoff now
  * Found another spot where we may not be trying to kick off the Worker and hence would lead to showing the notification from the MainThread

* Fix Test due to Roboelectric custom Main Thread Looper shadowing
  * Added `Looper.prepare`, `Looper.loop`, and `Looper.quit` calls for handling the postDelayed runnables
  * Add GenerateNotification.java MainThread check shadow
  * Add to String methods for better log
  * Make OSTimeoutHandler.java a composition reference instead of inheritance

Co-authored-by: Jeasmine Nahui <jeas.nahui@gmail.com>

Notification restore revamp to use Worker now
  * **Deleted Files:**
    * `NotificationRestorer`
    * `NotificationRestoreService`
    * `RestoreJobService`
    * `RestoreKickoffJobService`
    * Services all removed from `AndroidManifest` as well since `Worker` acts as a replacement
  * `UpgradeReceiver` and `BootUpReceiver` now kickoff notification restoring through `OSNotificationRestoreWorkManager`

Added boolean shouldDelay param to restore work manager
  * `OSNotificationRestoreWorkManager.beginEnqueueingWork` should have a `boolean shouldDelay` param
  * When app comes from boot or upgrade, add a 15 second delay to alleviate app doing to much work all at once

Fixed UnitTests related to app not being in foreground
  * The foreground issue is related to foreground handlers not firing now when app is backgrounded
  * Also fixed a network request assert in another UnitTest
  * `shouldGenerate2BasicGroupNotifications`

beforeCommit.message:
Notification restore revamp to use Worker now
  * **Deleted Files:**
    * `NotificationRestorer`
    * `NotificationRestoreService`
    * `RestoreJobService`
    * `RestoreKickoffJobService`
    * Services all removed from `AndroidManifest` as well since `Worker` acts as a replacement
  * `UpgradeReceiver` and `BootUpReceiver` now kickoff notification restoring through `OSNotificationRestoreWorkManager`

Added boolean shouldDelay param to restore work manager
  * `OSNotificationRestoreWorkManager.beginEnqueueingWork` should have a `boolean shouldDelay` param
  * When app comes from boot or upgrade, add a 15 second delay to alleviate app doing to much work all at once

Fixed UnitTests related to app not being in foreground
  * The foreground issue is related to foreground handlers not firing now when app is backgrounded
  * Also fixed a network request assert in another UnitTest
  * `shouldGenerate2BasicGroupNotifications`

commit.message: Fix Tests after Rebase
